name: pranking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that involves playing tricks that are intended to be funny but not to cause harm or damage: It was just harmless pranking. April Fool's Day is an occasion for much pranking. See
prank
More examplesFewer examplesHis playful pranking endears him to his friends.Pranking inevitably ends in tears.In the United States, Hallowe'en, celebrated on 31 October, was a time for parties and pranking.
